messages.1000094584:
Strike enemies in front, bouncing them into the air, then strike again for another bounce.
#yDamage: {0}%
All Incoming Damage: +{1}%
Duration: {2} sec
messages.1000079759:
Increases your stats. You'll continuously gain #vpower#w while the skill is active until you reach the max amount, then you'll become #ylethargic#w.
#yGrants {1} #vpower#y every {0} sec while the skill is active. (Power cannot be restored).
Movement Speed and Action Speed: +{2}%
Final Damage: +{3}%

#wPower
#yUp to {4}
Restores {6} power every {5} sec naturally.

#wLethargy
#yAction Speed and Movement Speed: -{7}%
messages.1000094585:
Take a step back while swinging to shoot a #ymagical afterimage#w at enemies. Press the #yregular attack#w button to shoot 2 more afterimages.
#yDamage: {0}% 

#wMagical Afterimage
#yDamage per Hit: {1}% + {3}
Duration: {2} sec
Can fire up to {3} afterimages.
messages.1000094586: Press the #yspecial attack button#w when you're being hit to push nearby enemies back.\n#yDamage: {0}%
messages.1000094587: Stab forward, attacking enemies, then tug your weapon back to draw them towards you.\n#yDamage: {0}%
messages.1000094588: Fire a spear of light that explodes when it hits an enemy, dealing damage to all nearby enemies and knocking down the enemy hit. Press the #yregular attack button#w during the attack to manually activate the explosion.\n#yDamage: {0}%\nAdditional Damage to Center: {1}%
messages.1000094589: Press the #yregular attack button#w during Tumble to charge forward and strike enemies twice with your weapon.\n#yDamage: {0}%
messages.1000094590:
Lower your guard to gather energy before executing a powerful takedown. Press the #yregular attack button#w while gathering energy to attack enemies immediately. The longer you charge, the greater the takedown's range and power.

(1st Charge)
#yDamage: {0}%
Attack Range: {1}m

#w(2nd Charge)
#yDamage: {2}%
Attack Range: {3}m

#w(3rd Charge)
#yDamage: {4}%
Attack Range: {5}m
messages.1000094591:
Creates a red magic circle that increases your attack damage. 
#yGrants {0} #vPower#y when used.
Magic Circle Range: {1}m
Magic Circle Duration: {2} sec#w

Buff Effect
#yDamage: +{3}%
Damage: +{4}%
Buff Duration: {5} sec
messages.1000094592: Jump, then throw a magical spear to the ground, which will deal damage and then explode after #y{0} sec#w.\n#yDamage: {1}%\n#yExplosion Damage: {2}%
messages.1000094593: Jump and charge forward in a twirl as you slash enemies, ending with a strong downward chop that launches nearby enemies.\n#yDamage: {0}%\nInvincibility: {1} sec
messages.1000093673:
Creates a blue magic circle that reduces the damage you take.
#yGrants {0} #vPower#y when used.
Magic Circle Range: {1}m
Magic Circle Duration: {2} sec#w

Buff Effect
#yAll Damage Taken: -{3}%
Buff Duration: {4} sec
messages.1000094594: Somersault forward twice, dealing damage to enemies. Press the #yup arrow twice#w or #yShift + up arrow#w in the air to use the skill.\n#yLight Magic\nDamage: {0}%
messages.1000094595:
Slam the ground with your spear to push enemies back and summon 8 magic spears. Press the #yregular attack button#w to fire the summoned magic spears in all directions.
#yDamage: {0}%

#wMagic Spear
#yDamage per Spear: {1}%
messages.1000094596:
Perform a twirl-thrust as you move forward, drawing enemies toward you. You'll adopt a ready stance at the end. You can deal additional hits in this stance. If you hold the stance for at least {0} sec, you'll reduce the skill's cooldown by {1} sec.

Additional Hits During Stance
#y(Regular Attack Button): #wPerform one more twirl-thrust and then adopt the ready stance again. Can be performed up to two times. The skill's cooldown will decrease by 2 more seconds during the last twirl-thrust.
#yDamage: {2}%
(Special Attack Button): #wGather energy, then slash enemies in front to blow them away. Damage will increase based on the number of twirl-thrusts you've performed.
#yDamage: {3}%
Damage per Twirl-thrust: +{4}%
messages.1000094597:
Perch at the top of your weapon to evade enemy attacks. Press the #yregular attack button#w to jump down, strike the ground, and launch enemies. Press the #yspecial attack button#w instead to jump forward and dodge enemy attacks.
You can also activate this skill by pressing the #yJump button#w during Tumble.
#yGrants {0} #vPower#y when used.
Damage: {1}%
Invincible while mounting the weapon.
messages.1000094598:
Twirl your spear to gather energy, then swing it, releasing an afterimage that deals consecutive damage.
#yDamage: {0}%

#wMagical Afterimage
#yDamage per Hit: {1}%
Duration: {2} sec
Can deal up to {3} hits.
